issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: TestSchemaTool is failing on trunk after branching

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
The metastore schema create scripts for 0.13 and 0.14 (current trunk) has  multiple other operations after setting the schema version. This is problematic   as any failure in those later operations would leave metastore in inconsistent state, and yet with valid version information. The schemaTool depends on the schema version details.

Recording the schema version should be the last step in schema initialization script.
fields.summary: Metastore init scripts should always populate the version information at the end

comments.body: [~ashutoshc] This is the followup patch as discussed in HIVE-6555.
